website_summaries.verdict: This entry-level amp is perfect for a smaller 4K home theater setup. It’s got 5.1 channels, which is ideal for smaller spaces, and high-end features like support for Dolby Atmos.
pros: It’s one of the most affordable Atmos-enabled amplifiers available
It supports Dolby Vision and 4K HDR, and it even has Bluetooth
cons: Home theater purists may prefer an amplifier that supports 7.1 or 9.2 channels
It might not be loud enough for larger home theaters

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver, excellent setup
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver with only one flaw I noticed. Excellent setup; in fact, best setup I have experience in over 40 years of buying receivers!! The only flaw I have experience with this unit is that when using the remote, the unit has a disturbing propensity of switching input from whatever is chosen by the user to 'TV.' Apparently, the unit has hidden preferences (tongue-firmly=in-cheek.) I would greatly recommend this unit; it is great!! As an engineer, I would love to learn this trick of giving electronics a mind of it's own,;-)
customer_reviews.author: James H. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Great A/V Receiver for watching movies and listening to music.
customer_reviews.text: You have to turn the sub woofer levels down from what the automatic setup preset since it has so much bass you can't hear the center channel dialogue very well. Overall, a great amplifier and sound system. Pioneer does it again with a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cook

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high end receiver, but then it sells for $229 (as opposed to $500 receivers). I previously had a Yamaha receiver which was disappointing. I alway expect technology to perform as advertised, and the Pioneer VSX-534 is solid. The pioneer runs a LOT cooler than the Yamaha also.
customer_reviews.author: CJArsenault

customer_reviews.title: Do not update FW to Version R108-0300-2120-0000
customer_reviews.text: Received receiver with FW ver. R104 and Dolby Atmos working directly no issue from my Xbox Box X1 ... After Upgrade to Ver. R108 I don't have atmos Available ... Planing to Contact Pioneer support.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Nice -  Finally Got It To Work
customer_reviews.text: Got the VSX-534 to replace a 10 year old Sony AV receiver. Set up was easy except for the CEC, which didn't work well with having an LG OLED TV, Panasonic BluRay, and an Arris1100 FIOS box. It kept switching the input back to TV or FIOS. So, after turning CEC off on and off on each device, it came down to the Arris box being the culprit. So, CEC is off on all the devices and it works flawlessly with my Harmony remote. The receiver operates great and even though I don't have height speakers, the ATMOS virtualizer works with my 5.1 set up. Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Zigfeldman

customer_reviews.title: Fits my budget and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it a lot, just what I wanted. Sounds great, but I also have some nice speakers to go with it. I have 8 series jamo bookshelf with fluance surround bookshelf for surround and elac 8" subwoofer, also a 6 speaker Polk center. Waiting for the atmos toppers for my jamo for the ultimate sound.
customer_reviews.author: George Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Very misleading ripoff
customer_reviews.text: The capabilites of this receiver are very misleading. You can set it up to use "height" speakers, the new part of Dolby Atmos/DTX X, or use traditional surround sound speakers, but not both. If you want a receiver that has surround sound and Atmos, like I do, search for 5.1.2 or 7.1.2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where's the quality control?
customer_reviews.text: Got it, set up all the connections etc. Then went to turn it on and... nothing. Unplugged it and plugged it back in. Still nothing. Did this a few more times and it turns on. I went thru the mic setup process and turned it off. A few hours later I go to use it and won't turn on. Unplug it and plug it back in and it turns on. So had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pennypacker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working (will not power up). Pioneer VSX-534 Receiver performed great for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is excellent for as long as it last. It completely stopped working (will not power up) after 3 months (February 12, 2020 to May 30, 2020). Until it stopped working the setup display on the TV is great, helps alot. Sound is also excellent & I like the way you can setup the speaker sound & distance. There are more features I like but these are only a few. Will submit for RMA.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer VSX-534
customer_reviews.text: The Pioneer VSX-534 5.2-Ch is exactly as described and more. Yes, I would by Pioneer again.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Tech savvy
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I am not very tech. savvy. It was ordered thinking it would be so simple to set up , the wiring part was a breeze but the instructions for this equipment is about 30-40 pages and not as simple as it is made to sound. I am still working on it to get the correct sound and balance from speakers even after 2 months . I am sure it is my own inability in the tech portion ,but the equipment sounds good so far but could be better .
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Two days after I have this VSX-534 in the cart the price went up by $20.00. I could have gone to other receiver for the same price of $249.00 but decided to stay. The main reason for staying was that this VSX-534 is only 12lbs. Easy to set up but you have to connect it to a monitor. It satisfied my simple 5.1 home theater set up in my master bedroom. The delivery was quick. My order was shipped the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen, S

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Performance
customer_reviews.text: You lose some of the Pioneer functions like 3 channel mode, but you gain all the clarity and usability that Onkyo could cram into the device. Oh yeah, it also allows me to connect all my 4K devices through it without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Kerber

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the receiver for the every man/woman. Great sound and easy setup. Wish everything was banana clips but it's not a game changer. It nails all the important stuff
customer_reviews.author: sherdog16

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is worth every penny I spend! Only negative "thing" is USB port located on back of this device. Why, is beyond my understanding. Other than that, I'll buy PIONEER product any time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup, great user interface, simple and have all you need at your finger tips.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, great user interface, simple and have all you need at your finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent av receiver, very easy to use and set up. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: chae white

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Pulled this right out of the box and could not get any video out of it, called Pioneer and they said the unit was defective. They said since it was an Amazon purchase it must be returned through them. I returned the unit and went with a Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S.

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent product for the money. It gets the job done with easy set up. I have it in a small room so I can't complain. If you want high end look for a more recent model.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: No issues at all and extremely easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, works great, and sound is way better than the price would lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.author: GainzofThronesPartDeux

customer_reviews.title: Nice receiver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver, especially for the price. The sound is great, as you would expect from Pioneer. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: So far my Pioneer VSX-534 is working fine, good sound,( at least my wife is always saying turn it down it's to loud) good picture. For what I paid for it I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: A and B zones
customer_reviews.text: B zone will not power speakers. I want it to power two outside deck speakers. Very hard from description to tell how to order what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy L.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and received it in just a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Great mid tier receiver!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice update to my old pioneer receiver from 2012. It’s definitely lighter and smaller than older receivers while having a lot mode audio and video options! This thing is loaded with all the audio formats you could need at home. The integrated Bluetooth works great with about a 50 ft range or so before you see dropout. The sound is pretty amazing with even just 3 front speakers. Easy to connect and install and great quality as I have come to expect from pioneer. Works great with our vizio TV but plan on connecting directly to a projector but don’t expect any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer still rocks
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Pioneer amps waaay back in the day.... they seem to have went silent, welcome back! hee hee.. I am sure that is not true, but have not seen them much. regardless, this is a great sounding amp for the price tag... my only use is music via blue tooth...but set up requried a tv, which makes sense as this is made for 4k tv, but surprised set up requries tv.... hmmmm.. times are a changin!!! again for this price, and reasonable sound from a bass and a few speakers, hard to find a flaw. the ins n outs seen in the pix above, are plentiful, and modern to fit the ever changing field of electronics!!!
customer_reviews.author: funbear

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Setup is easy and fast. Tt goes through all the speaker configurations (from 2 stereo speakers to 5.2 on this model VSX-534). It has an audio sensing microphone that you place where you will be listening. Then it does some test tones and adjusts itself for optimal sound. Once I got the wired connections complete, the whole setup took maybe 10 minutes. The audio sound is very good, all inputs and connections are clear and easy to hook up. The Bluetooth connection works really well - great to use with Alexa, phone, computer or virtually any streaming device. The slim design really saves space in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any problems to report with this unit. I think it’s a great item for the frugal price. Good stereo effect for my home. Quality craftsmanship. Easy to link. The feet don’t scratch my bookshelf at all. I love the easy access remote control and it has a good range. If I use headphones I get good sound quality with that etc. I was able to set up my pre set mode in a matter of minutes. So far, everything has worked smoothly. It takes up a bit more room than I’d like but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: Good Mid-Level Reveiver
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent entry to mid level receiver. There aren't many over the top qualities, but it does have bluetooth a d 4k support. If your looking for a high end reciever with all the bells and whistles, this is not the one for you. However, if you're looking for a good, quality system at a reasonable price, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver and well worth the money. The sound, features, and "fun level" are outstanding. It is somewhat simple to set up. It has a Bluetooth feature, and you can use your phone, with a special app, to control it. This has become the norm with electronics, and I feel it is nice to be able to control so many items with one device. I have a folder on my Samsung Galaxy phone that contains all of my electronics' apps.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clean sound. Easy to install, just follow the onscreen instructions. Pairing with Bluetooth devices was simple and easy. Reasonable range on the Bluetooth. Automatically configures the speakers for optimum quality. Being able to rename the inputs is fantastic and makes it much easier for friends to use. Simple remote but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Steenburgh

customer_reviews.title: surround sound receiver
customer_reviews.text: I found this unusable as a regular audio receiver because it demands and electronic setup using a television, which I don't have. It has good features and I'm sure it sounds terrific, I just could not make use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Woirhaye

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our 6+ year old Yamaha receiver with this one. Husband is disappointed that it's not compatible with 7.1 surround but I have to say that the sound is excellent without it! Though he may disagree. I love the wireless headphone and bluetooth technology with this one too. It works fabulously with our fire cube! At this point I don't have any complaints. Easy to set up and wonderful sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi D.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: When connecting and playing music with my iPhone X, it can take five minutes before any sound comes. I have no idea whether to blame Apple or Pioneer, but the help site of Pioneer has no answer, and the iPhone just recommends moving closer, even if the phone lies on top of the receiver.
customer_reviews.author: book reader

customer_reviews.title: Missing Component, With No Solution
customer_reviews.text: The VSX-534 may be a good receiver when it works, but mine came missing a part. For that reason, I have to rate it 1 star. I understand that mistakes can happen in manufacturing and would normally just contact support and work out a solution. What I expected to be a simple exchange started around 4 months ago. Responses were extremely slow, shifting me between departments for some reason. Finally, they just stopped responses altogether. It was a strange series of e-mails, even if I never felt they were being rude and everything was cordial. It could just be very disorganized. Regardless, I would think twice before buying a Pioneer product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Alert

product_meta.title: Pioneer VSX-534 Home Audio Smart AV Receiver 5.2-Ch HDR10, Dolby Vision, Atmos and Virtual Enabled with 4K and Bluetooth
product_meta.description: Pioneer VSX-534 Home Audio Smart AV Receiver 5.2-Ch HDR10, Dolby Vision, Atmos and Virtual Enabled with 4K and Bluetooth. The VSX-534 comes in a user-friendly new design, with 12% slimmer size than the previous model for easy installation, 4K indicator and personal preset and Bluetooth input buttons on the front panel. Immerse in enveloping sound with Dolby Atoms and DTS: x Audio formats. Or even without height or surround speakers, you can still enjoy virtual 3D surround effect with Dolby Atoms height vitalize* and DTS virtual: x. The AV receiver is compatible with Ultra HD, HDR10, HOG and Dolby visions with support for HDCP 2. 2, so you can fully appreciate premium content such as 4K videos.
feature_bullets: DTS:X PLAYBACK. Dolby Atmos and DTS:X is the next-generation audio codec from DTS that leverages object-based audio to enable new immersive and interactive audio experiences.

BLUETOOTH COMPATIBLE. Seamlessly connect your phone, tablet or PC and stream to the receiver with Bluetooth Wireless Technology. This smart receiver remembers your device and starts playback whenever it detects an incoming Bluetooth audio stream.

DOLBY ATMOS. Dolby Atmos Height Virtualizer provides an immersive listening experience, creating a virtual surround and height effect without employing additional surround or height speakers. 5.1.2ch Dolby Atmos.

PERSONAL PRESET. Press the personal preset button on the front panel for three seconds and your current settings such as volume level and listening mode. Up to three presets can be registered and called up from the front panel button or remote control.
RANGE CONTROL. With this unique mid-range sound control feature, you can make independent volume adjustments to the range including dialogues in films, with the up/down key on the remote control.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
